entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a person who has never been seduced by the Dark Arts and has shown no desire to become one of Voldemort's followers. He is also mentioned as having had a privileged insight into Voldemort's world.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as a person who has given Harry the tools for the job and has been responsible for Harry's ability to see into his thoughts and understand his ambitions. He is also mentioned as having a snakelike language in which he gives orders.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as a person who has loudly stated that Harry's ability to love is the only protection against the lure of power like Voldemort's.

relationships.description: Voldemort gave Harry the tools for the job, allowing him to see into his thoughts and understand his ambitions.
Dumbledore states that Voldemort is responsible for Harry's ability to love, which is the only protection against the lure of power like Voldemort's.
